content.question: President Eisenhowerâ€™s actions in the excerpt were most similar to which of the following earlier actions?

choices.label: The ending of segregation in the military in the 1940s
The internment of Japanese Americans during the Second World War
The removal of American Indians to reservations in the 1830s
The issuing of the Emancipation Proclamation during the Civil War

content.answer: The ending of segregation in the military in the 1940s

topic.text: 8.6: Early Steps in the Civil Rights Movement (1940s and 1950s)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
